alert.note: Alert for Shannon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 14 at 5:14AM CDT until May 14 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Springfield MO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Missouri... Jacks Fork at Alley Spring affecting Shannon County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO LATE THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...The river is forecast to reach flood stage of 9.0 feet by around 10am. * WHERE...Jacks Fork at Alley Spring. * WHEN...From this morning to late this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, floating access to the Jacks Fork at Alley Spring is closed and water begins to impact the Alley Spring Camp ground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:30 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 4.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 2.7 feet Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
